Name: Phantom
Notes: Most popular Solana wallet, with one-tap Solana Pay support.

Name: Solflare
Notes: The first dedicated Solana wallet with one-tap Solana Pay support.

Name: Exodus
Notes: Exodus offers one-tap Solana Pay via QR code scanning.

Name: Coinbase Wallet
Notes: Beginner-friendly, Coinbase integration

Name: Atomic Wallet
Notes: Atomic Wallet's Solana Pay: buried, sync errors, UX needs polish

Name: Glow
Notes: One‑tap deep‑link; occasional buried flow. Devnet errors, adapter quirks. Smooth UX.

Name: Backpack
Notes: One-tap QR prominence; buried links. Focuses on scanning, not deep menus.

Name: Trust Wallet
Notes: Solana Pay in Trust Wallet: functional, but not one-tap.

Name: Brave Wallet
Notes: Built into Brave browser, privacy-focused

Name: Robinhood Wallet
Notes: Robinhood Wallet supports Solana Pay; one-tap streamlined, buried errors persist.

Name: OKX Wallet
Notes: OKX Wallet places Solana Pay behind extra taps, occasional QR errors disrupt flow.

Name: Binance Web3 Wallet
Notes: Likely accessible but requires multi-step verification due to MPC key management

Name: Tiplink
Notes: Frictionless with Google Account

Name: Fuse Wallet
Notes: Fuse Wallet's Solana Pay: one-tap, seamless UX, minimal errors, intuitive.

Name: Crossmint Non-Custodial
Notes: Crossmint's non-custodial Solana Pay: one-tap simplicity, minimal errors, seamless UX.

Name: Decaf
Notes: Decaf Wallet: Seamless Solana Pay, intuitive UX.

Name: Bitget Wallet
Notes: Bitget Wallet's Solana Pay: seamless one-tap payments

Name: Jupiter Wallet
Notes: Jupiter Wallet: Seamless one-tap Solana Pay, minimal errors, intuitive UX.

Name: WalletConnect
Notes: Open protocol for connecting DApps to mobile wallets. Not a standalone app, protocol/library.

Name: Helium Wallet
Notes: Dedicated wallet for the Helium Network, manages HNT and other Helium ecosystem tokens. Native Helium blockchain wallet.

Name: Para
Notes: Focuses on simplifying Web3 access, social login support. Algorand wallet, new navigation.

Name: Espresso Cash
Notes: Mobile-first, focuses on easy peer-to-peer crypto payments. Global money app, stablecoins.

Name: Ledger Nano S
Notes: Entry-level hardware wallet, secure offline storage of private keys. Universal for Ledger devices.

Name: Trezor Safe 3
Notes: Secure element chip, touchscreen, focuses on ease of use and security. Universal for Trezor models.

Name: SafePal S1 Pro
Notes: Enhanced version of S1, improved build quality and features. Universal SafePal hardware app.

Name: Keystone Pro 3
Notes: Air-gapped, fingerprint sensor, open-source firmware, large touchscreen. For Keystone 3 Pro.

Name: Tangem Wallet
Notes: Card-shaped hardware wallet, no cables or batteries, relies on NFC. Enhanced security, Sui/Kaspa support.

Name: Arculus
Notes: Card-based cold storage wallet, 3-factor authentication. Hardware wallet, check official site for latest.
